column4: Looking to buy the HP DV5-1125NR and it's got the ATI RADEON HD 3200 graphics RS780M. Does anyone know if Ubuntu Hardy supports this chip??
what will you be using this machine for?
so why do you care about Ubuntu? ;)
did Blizzard release a Linux port while i was alseep? :)
from what i hear, WoW and "learning" are mutually exclusive pursuits :)
i'm stlll keeping my vista partition....but i want to install ubuntu on another partition
stick with Intel graphics and wireless when using Linux (for now)
but i was curious if i was gonna be able to run compizf
i can't run 8.10 and compiz on what i have now...which is intel gm965
Compiz and my GMA965 are quite happy together
there's no reason you can;t run Hardy
i'm on hardy too.....and i can run compiz...no i'm using this system with hardy
